scripts.install:android: cp config/config-prod-android.xml config.xml && cordova platform add android && scripts/patch-android-config.sh
scripts.install:ios: cp config/config-prod-ios.xml config.xml && cordova platform add ios
scripts.prebuild:android: NODE_ENV=production PLATFORM=android ../node_modules/.bin/parcel build ../src/index.prod-android.njk --public-url=./ --detailed-report --no-source-maps && cp config/config-prod-android.xml config.xml
scripts.prebuild:ios: NODE_ENV=production PLATFORM=ios ../node_modules/.bin/parcel build ../src/index.prod-ios.njk --public-url=./ --detailed-report --no-source-maps && cp config/config-prod-ios.xml config.xml
scripts.build:android: npm run prebuild:android && dotenv -- cordova build android
scripts.build:ios: npm run prebuild:ios && cordova build ios
scripts.dev:cordova:android: ../node_modules/.bin/parcel build ../src/index.dev-android.njk --public-url=./ && cp config/config-dev-android.xml config.xml && dotenv -- cordova build android
scripts.dev:cordova:ios: ../node_modules/.bin/parcel build ../src/index.dev-ios.njk --public-url=./ && cp config/config-dev-ios.xml config.xml && cordova build ios
